00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TSizeB1.hpp"

00041 
00042 std::string TSizeB1::get_name() const
00043   { return "TSizeB1"; }
00044 
00045 TSizeB1::~TSizeB1() {}
00046 
00047 bool TSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00048                         double& result, 
00049                         MsqError& err )
00050 {
00051   double d = det(T);
00052   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00053     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00054     return false;
00055   }
00056   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00057   return true;  
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool TSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00061                                   double& result,
00062                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00063                                   MsqError& err )
00064 {
00065   double d = det(T);
00066   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00067     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00068     return false;
00069   }
00070   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00071   deriv_wrt_T = (1 - 1/(d*d)) * transpose_adj(T);
00072   return true;  
00073 }
00074 
00075 bool TSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00076                                   double& result,
00077                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00078                                   MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00079                                   MsqError& err )
00080 {
00081   double d = det(T);
00082   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00083     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00084     return false;
00085   }
00086   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00087   MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00088   const double f = 1 - 1/(d*d);
00089   deriv_wrt_T = f * adjt;
00090   
00091   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 2/(d*d*d), adjt );
00092   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, f, T );
00093   return true;  
00094 }
00095 
00096 bool TSizeB1::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00097                         double& result, 
00098                         MsqError& err )
00099 {
00100   double d = det(T);
00101   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00102     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00103     return false;
00104   }
00105   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00106   return true;  
00107 }

00109 bool TSizeB1::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00110                                   double& result,
00111                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00112                                   MsqError& err )
00113 {
00114   double d = det(T);
00115   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00116     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00117     return false;
00118   }
00119   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00120   deriv_wrt_T = (1 - 1/(d*d)) * transpose_adj(T);
00121   return true;  
00122 }
00123 
00124 bool TSizeB1::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00125                                   double& result,
00126                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00127                                   MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00128                                   MsqError& err )
00129 {
00130   double d = det(T);
00131   if (TMetric::invalid_determinant(d)) {
00132     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00133     return false;
00134   }
00135   result = d + 1.0/d - 2.0;
00136   MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00137   const double f = 1 - 1/(d*d);
00138   deriv_wrt_T = f * adjt;
00139   
00140   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 2/(d*d*d), adjt );
00141   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, f, T );
00142   return true;  
00143 }
